articles.title: Former 76ers Player Signing With New Team - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Former Seton Hall star Myles Powell is signing with the Bay Area Dragons in the East Asia Super League. Powell has played for the Philadelphia 76ers, and also been with the New York Knicks organization.
articles.content:
